definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc

sentences.english: The two works belong to different schools and have different styles.
sentences.chinese: 属于不同的流别，风格很不一样。

definition: (of watercourses) source and direction of flow/origin and development

Six Classics, namely: Book of Songs 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], Book of History 尚書|尚书[Shang4 shu1], Book of Rites 儀禮|仪礼[Yi2 li3], the lost Book of Music 樂經|乐经[Yue4 jing1], Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], Spring and Autumn Annals 春秋[Chun1 qiu1]
variant of 原原本本[yuan2 yuan2 ben3 ben3]
scattered essays/various opinions/different manners of speaking
to interpret and make glossaries and commentaries on classic texts
variant of 帙[zhi4]/variant of 秩[zhi4]/(classifier) ten years
